name: Ninja Cat 3 - Platformer Game
description:
It's time to show off your Ninja Skills. Help Scratch Cat fight rats, solve puzzles, and find fish to eat!

Controls for keyboard:

- WASD / arrow keys: move, jump, climb, push.

- SPACE: interact, attack.

- R: reset

- M: return to main menu

Controls for mobile:

- Press your finger in the direction you want to move, jump, climb, or push.

- Tap near Scratch Cat to interact or attack.
